entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 9:50 PM ADT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:50 PM ADT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 9:50 PM ADT Friday 17 March 2023
